titleStmt.title: Samuel Howard et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG4161

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's official correspondence file, petitions for pardons, remissions, and respites 1863-1867

body.p:
To his Excellency Thos E Bramlett
Govenor of the State of Kentucky

We your petitioners citizens of Carroll County beg leave to represent to your Excellency that at the late August term of the carroll circuit court our neighbor G W Birkshire was fined by the Honorable Judge Drainane the Sum of fifty dollars on an Indictment for Shooting with a pistol at G S Blessing We would further State that Said Birkshire is a man of but little means and cannot without great inconveniance pay said fine and further that the Shooting was done while in a state of great excitement and that at the time the said Blessing gave the lie direct to Birkshire in regard to his statement that he was robed a few nights before by a company of Southern soldiers who entered his house and robed him of 250 dollars
Said Blessing was not hit or wounded by the Shooting but the Judge could not comply with the law without inflicting the above fine of fifty dollars

We your petitioners in view of the whole premises believe this to be a propper case for the exercise of Executive Clemency and respectfully ask your Excellency to remit the fine or somuch thereoff as you may deem propper

Saml Howard
Lewis. S. Owen
D. G. Owen
W McClure
N, D, Blythe. P. M. Ghent Ky.
L. C. Gex
John. H. Ellis
Thomas Hopkins
Berryman Ellis
Joseph Brooks
James Han
L Bailey Marshall . G.
Wm Swango
Michal Maroney
H C Howard C, C, C
C L Keene
Wm Howard
John Bailey
Peter Wycoff
H J Wing
Jos, F, Blythe 32d Reg K, V, I
Virgil, S, Bledsoe
James R Cockrell
Henry M Griffith

Tho E Bramlette
Govr
vs
G. W. Birkshire
Shooting
$50
16th Nov/63
